Name: Delicious Sour
Ingredients: 10 ml Giffard Crème de Pêche de Vigne liqueur
15 ml Egg white (pasteurised) or 																																			Aquafaba (chickpea water)																								 or 3 dashes Fee Brothers Fee Foam cocktail foamer
3 drop Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist expressed & discarded. Adorn with dehydrated apple slice..
History: Adapted from a recipe in William Schmidt's 1892 The Flowing Bowl .
Nutrition: One serving of Delicious Sour contains 168 calories
